Job Title: Assistant Project Manager

Location: Eagle, CO

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Finance, Management, Project Management

Description:
Assistant Project ManagerEagle, Colorado$95,000 - $115,000 + Bonus + Insurances + Training + Progression Available + PTO
Excellent opportunity for an Assistant Project Manager looking to join an industry leading contractor, working on exciting projects within a close knit team, for a company well known to look after their employees and offer job stability.
Are you an Assistant Project Manager with mechanical engineering or plumbing experience? Are you looking to join a business who boast an excellent reputation of taking care of their staff, where the average tenure is significant and the rewards for it are great?
Established for over 20 years, this organisation are highly respected in the mechanical contracting industry. Offering multiple services, they pride themselves on the quality of service they provide for a building’s environment. They have built a reputation for delivering unparalleled expertise within the market and remain the go to company, utilizing the most innovative and dependable workforce to guarantee their client’s goals are met. They have experienced significant growth over the past five years and are looking to recruit an Assistant Project Manager to join their close knit and loyal team.
In this role you will be responsible for carrying out all majority responsibilities of construction projects; organizing, managing changes, overseeing the financials of the project and building strong relationships with new and repeat clients. You will be the liaison between the company and it’s customers, conducting regular reviews and coordinating with the field managers and engineers to provide effective solutions.
With an exciting vision and core values that energize the entire company, collaboration, communication and comprehensive benefits have been central to their recent growth. You will be recognised for your service and will make an impact in the company, community and beyond.
This role would ideally suit an Assistant Project Manager who is looking for longevity in their career, fantastic training and the desire to work for a company that are renowned for looking after their loyal employees.
The RoleConduct reviews, provide cost projections and manage financial changes as necessaryResponsible for building and maintaining relationships with new and repeat customers.Ensure clear lines of communication with the owner, generator contractor and all personnel on the project50% in the office and 50% onsite$95,000 - $115,000 + Bonus + Insurances + Training + Progression Available + PTO
The PersonPlumbing/Mechanical construction project experiencePrevious experience supervising and leading projectsExperience on multi-million dollar projectsLooking for a long term, stable role To apply for this role or to be considered for further roles, please click "Apply Now" or contact Matt Appleby at Rise Technical Recruitment.
Rise Technical Recruitment Ltd acts an employment agency for permanent roles and an employment business for temporary roles.
The salary advertised is the bracket available for this position. The actual salary paid will be dependent on your level of experience, qualifications and skill set. We are an equal opportunities employer and welcome applications from all suitable candidates.

Experience Level (if available): None
